Text: Why do you encode at such high resolution .. I love your work but it's just that my home theatre won't read such high-res movies

@MelVeL :

When I take a challenge and encode something [usually a good  or, better, a winner movie] I chose the quality/dimension/resolution which is not released yet  !   The thing that you need was here for a long time  ago :  
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4521960/Amadeus-DVDRip.DC.AC3.5_1[Eng]1984.avi 
                  I don't say it cannot be done better at a resolution for DvD-Player [stand-alone ][that means max. 720x576]. I'll think about that !! 

Thanks four your appreciation ! Cheers!

People need to stop complaining on TPB. These people are spending time and bandwidth to bring you something free and saving you thousands of dollars. These are all virus free awesome downloads! They even come with subtitle attachments and different language tracks! But still people find a way to complain about something always. Remember limewire when songs didnt come with artwork and you had to hope a file didnt have a trojan and fuck up your computer? I'm just saying... dont be an entitled POS and be grateful! Thanks so much CODYBOSS1969!

Have downloaded and watched, looks pretty good.  Not completely perfect but NO flaws and quite clear, unlike the 1.36 gb version I had before.  If you're like me and can't watch the BIG stuff as it slows your computer (4 gb+ does for me), then this is good.
